example.name: that shouldn't be a liquid!
example.text: Then as things got rougher, we ran for the door and spent the next few minutes outside watching the brick sidewalk under our feet oozing up and down, and the flowers waving in an eerie rhythm.
example.arg: the brick sidewalk under our feet

predicate.note: Frames file for 'ooze' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 43.4, Framenet entry Fluidic motion. Gotta love these names.
